stereo.tools.CellTypeAnno¶

class stereo.tools.CellTypeAnno(adata, ref_dir=None, cores=1, keep_zeros=True, use_rf=True, sample_rate=0.8, n_estimators=20, strategy='1', method='spearmanr', split_num=1, out_dir=None, name='cell_type_anno')¶

predict bin-cells’s type

__init__(adata, ref_dir=None, cores=1, keep_zeros=True, use_rf=True, sample_rate=0.8, n_estimators=20, strategy='1', method='spearmanr', split_num=1, out_dir=None, name='cell_type_anno')¶

initialization

Parameters

  • adata – anndata object

  • ref_dir – reference database directory

  • cores – set running core to fasten running speed

  • keep_zeros – if true, keeping the genes that in reference but not in input expression data

  • use_rf – if running random choosing genes or not

  • sample_rate – ratio of sampling data

  • n_estimators – prediction times

  • strategy –

  • method – calculate correlation’s method

  • split_num –

  • out_dir – output directory

  • name – name of this tool and will be used as a key when adding tool result to andata object.
